name: google-drive-skip-download-anyway
description: A simple, lightweight userscript that automatically clicks 'Download anyway' when Google Drive shows the virus scan warning dialog

scripts.lint: echo 'Linting userscripts...' && node -e "const fs=require('fs');fs.readdirSync('.').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.user.js')).forEach(f=>{const c=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');if(!c.includes('==UserScript=='))throw new Error(f+': Missing userscript header');console.log('âœ… '+f+' validated');})"

author: MrErrorSan
